mapper.select:
SELECT B.BNO, B.RATINGS, B.PNAME, B.TITLE, M.ID, M.NAME, B.CONTENT, B.READCOUNT, B.ATTACHCOUNT, B.REPLYCOUNT, B.CREATE_DATE FROM PRFBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND B.PNAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY B.BNO DESC
ORDER BY B.READCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY B.REPLYCOUNT DESC
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRFBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND B.PNAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT B.BNO, M.ID, M.NAME, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.RATINGS, B.READCOUNT, B.ATTACHCOUNT, B.REPLYCOUNT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE FROM PRFBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BNO = #{bno}
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS bno
INSERT INTO PRFBOARD (bNO, mNO, PNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, RATINGS) VALUES(0, #{mno}, #{pname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ratings})
INSERT INTO PRFBOARD_ATTACH_FILE (fNO, bNO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CREATE_DATE) VALUES(#{fno}, #{bno}, #{originalFilename}, #{renamedFilename}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRFBOARD SET ATTACHCOUNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRFBOARD_ATTACH_FILE WHERE BNO = #{bno}) WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRFREPLY( RNO, BNO, MNO, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES( default, #{bno}, #{mno}, #{content}, default, default, default )
mapper.select: SELECT R.RNO, R.BNO, R.CONTENT, M.ID, M.NAME, R.CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE FROM PRFREPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE R.STATUS='Y' AND BNO = ${bno} ORDER BY R.RNO DESC
